All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CaptureAct
    intermediate class to allow code scanner to open
    CodeFoundFragment
    This is the fragment that appears after the camera detects a QR code from the MainActivity Here, the user can take a picture of the code with their camera, and decide whether to tag the code with a geolocation
    CustomHeader
    CustomHeader is a class used to create a header which can be displayed in activities This header contains a back button, a label describing which activity the back button will take the user to, and a label describing the current activity
    CustomMarker  
    FireStoreAuthentication  
    FireStoreBooleanResults  
    FireStoreClass
    Create an instance of the Firestore database
    FireStoreLIstResults
    Interface used to get a List of player codes from a firestore query (used to deal with Firestore's asynchronous behaviour)
    FireStorePlayerCodeResults
    Interface used to get a Player code from a firestore query (used to deal with Firestore's asynchronous behaviour)
    FireStoreResults
    Interface used to get the total score and total scanned QR Codes from a firestore query (used to deal with Firestore's asynchronous behaviour)
    GithubPlaceholder  
    Globals  
    LeaderboardActivity  
    LeaderboardAdapter  
    LeaderboardAdapter.ViewHolder  
    LoginActivity
    Class used to log a user into the app or to register a new user for using the app
    MainActivity
    the MainActivity of the app, contains buttons to open the camera to scan a code, view the users profile, open the map, and view other players' stats
    MapActivity
    MapActivity is an activity which displays a map, containing markers for code locations This activity implements OpenStreetMaps instead of Google Maps Much of the code in this class was adapted from the OpenStreetMaps tutorial, link is https://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid/wiki/How-to-use-the-osmdroid-library-(Java)
    OtherPlayersCaughtFragment
    Fragment Class used to display a list of players who have caught a QRCode
    PlayerAdapter  
    PlayerCode
    This class is what shows up on the player profile Create custom ListView adapter similar to GasStation in Assignment1
    ProfileActivity
    This is a class that is an activity containing all of user's code
    ProfileListActivity  
    RecyclerViewInterface  
    RegisterFragment
    Dialog fragment that allows a new user to register for the app
    ScannedCode
    This class represents the result of a scanned code, will be used to handle the methods responsible for scoring, name, image
    SearchAdapter
    This is an adapter class responsible for rendering informations onto the recycler view
    SearchUserActivity
    This is an activity for searching users by username
    SeeCommentsActivity  
    SelectCodeActivity
    This is a class that creates and maintains an activity which shows detailed info and extra functionalities for each scanned code from the list of codes.
    Users
    This is a model class containing user information
